price: 144. Wuxuu ku negaan lahaa caloosha (nibriga) tan iyo Maalinta Qiyaamaha.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
